SELECT SU.USER_NO ,SU.USER_ID ,SU.USER_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(SU.USER_BIRTHDAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS USER_BIRTHDAY ,DATE_FORMAT(SU.USER_RGST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS USER_RGST_DT ,SU.USER_DELETE_YN ,DATE_FORMAT(SU.USER_DELETE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS USER_DELETE_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(SU.LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LOGIN_DT ,SU.LOGIN_CK AS LOGIN_CK ,SU.USER_TYPE AS USER_TYPE ,SSUD.PA_USER_NAME AS PA_USER_NAME ,SSUD.PA_USER_TEL_NO AS PA_USER_TEL_NO ,SSUD.TEETH_TYPE ,SSUD.AGRE_YN FROM ST_USER SU LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_STUDENT_USER_DETAIL SSUD ON SU.USER_ID = SSUD.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND SU.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT CHILD_ID FROM ST_PARENT_USER_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_NAME FROM ST_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT SSUD.TEACHER_ID AS CLASS_NAME ,SU.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME ,SU.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(STM.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MEASURE_DT FROM ST_TEETH_MEASURE STM LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_STUDENT_USER_DETAIL SSUD ON STM.USER_ID = SSUD.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_USER SU ON SSUD.USER_ID = SU.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TEACHER_ID = #{classCode} AND DATE_FORMAT(MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{measureDt} ORDER BY SU.USER_NAME
